[imagen] Avoid pipe from ghostscript to convert.

Some problem about this way to connect those two programms
has been reported by S. Datskovskiy.

Co-authored-by:"Stanislav Datskovskiy" <stas@loper-os.org>
Ready for version 2.36

Silence warnings

  + Code is corrected to silence record related warnings.
  + Warning 70 (no .mli file) is disabled.

Merge pull request #68 from Octachron/OCaml_5_compatibility

OCaml 5 support: remove uses of deprecated functions

This PR replaces the deprecated functions that were removed in OCaml 5 by their OCaml ≥4.08 equivalent.
It also sneakily enable the deprecation warning.

commit.message:
[html] Do  not use zero-width-joiner to implement non-breakable space. (#61)

Some browsers (_e.g._ Firefox) render zwj poorly. Hence this alternative
implementation of space that should not break as sequence of non-breaking
spaces (U+2040) and narrow no-break spaces (U+202F).

verification.payload:
tree a78cb6a062178834c98e141410d8dd1213848292
parent 54985d75d82fe86e832cc8d52e6c14f878ac51d6

spaces (U+2040) and narrow no-break spaces (U+202F).

commit.message: Update README file
[doc] Small correction in Makefile.
Ready for release 2.35
Small correction in Makefile
Define \@def@charset for text output. Same definition as for html.

Rename `\@figrule' to `\@floatrule'; give it its own CSS class; (#56)

make the tob/bottom separators of floats (`figure' and `table') easily
re-definable with macro `\floatseparator'.  Document the new
capabilities along with CSS-classes `.footnotetext' and
`.footnoterule'.

verification.payload:
tree 22e4eecde258c0dd3fdab2fa236b532be2939b1e
parent e58d8e326a95da8abb8ba259dfa3ef6d58ba7a8e
author Chris Spiel <cspiel@freenet.de> 1608540038 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1608540038 +0100

Rename `\@figrule' to `\@floatrule'; give it its own CSS class; (#56)

make the tob/bottom separators of floats (`figure' and `table') easily
re-definable with macro `\floatseparator'.  Document the new
capabilities along with CSS-classes `.footnotetext' and
`.footnoterule'.

commit.message:
Update PDF documentation generation (#55)

* * Fix quoting bug in recipe for "version.tex".
* Indroduce variables for all binaries.
* Make phony targets where possible.
* Rely in automatic variables in recipes.
* Rewrite LaTeX recipe to follow Hevea's `-fix' option.

* Switch to pdflatex.
Change the generation of the PDF version of the manual
from latex -> dvips -> ps2pdf to pdflatex.  Simplify
file "macros.tex" accordingly.

Sort `\usepackage' calls at the top of "text.tex" for more clarity.
Substitute `imakeidx' for `makeidx'.  This allows us to omit the
makeindex call in "Makefile".  Add `lmodern' and `microtype' packages.

* Update doc/Makefile

Avoid ambiguous makefile variable.

Co-authored-by: Luc Maranget <Luc.Maranget@inria.fr>

verification.payload:
tree a136c6e9da859b531cde828acaeb01f9eddc3303
parent f6690fd5847ffe296f46f243f6b7f274549b06f4
author Chris Spiel <cspiel@freenet.de> 1608539793 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1608539793 +0100

Update PDF documentation generation (#55)

* * Fix quoting bug in recipe for "version.tex".
* Indroduce variables for all binaries.
* Make phony targets where possible.
* Rely in automatic variables in recipes.
* Rewrite LaTeX recipe to follow Hevea's `-fix' option.

* Switch to pdflatex.
Change the generation of the PDF version of the manual
from latex -> dvips -> ps2pdf to pdflatex.  Simplify
file "macros.tex" accordingly.

Sort `\usepackage' calls at the top of "text.tex" for more clarity.
Substitute `imakeidx' for `makeidx'.  This allows us to omit the
makeindex call in "Makefile".  Add `lmodern' and `microtype' packages.

* Update doc/Makefile

Avoid ambiguous makefile variable.

Co-authored-by: Luc Maranget <Luc.Maranget@inria.fr>

commit.message: [doc] Update documentation following the new implementation of `\rule`.

SVG-based macro \rule (#50)

* Let internal macro `\css@length' handle percentages.

* Define macro `\rule' that closely mimics LaTeX.
Even struts are feasible!  The previously valid call of `\rule{}{}'
produces an error now; it always would have been rejected by LaTeX.
To get back the old behavior use `\@printHR{}{}'.

* Remove obsolete documention on restrictions of macro \rule.

verification.payload:
tree 70a1d8a05dbbb893cd7384cba58786c384448a67
parent 7e3e32bfc4d624ef8d83784f7113766b389678e4
author Chris Spiel <cspiel@freenet.de> 1608536465 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1608536465 +0100

SVG-based macro \rule (#50)

* Let internal macro `\css@length' handle percentages.

* Define macro `\rule' that closely mimics LaTeX.
Even struts are feasible!  The previously valid call of `\rule{}{}'
produces an error now; it always would have been rejected by LaTeX.
To get back the old behavior use `\@printHR{}{}'.

* Remove obsolete documention on restrictions of macro \rule.

commit.message:
Synchronize the code paths for GNU Info and Plain Text output (#51)

with the recent changes in the HTML path.

 * Dest.put_unicode OutUnicode.visible_space raised an exception in
   text mode.  The new code expands macro `\textvisiblespace' on the
   fly and prints its expansion.
 * Margin paragraphs, hyphenation and fine-grained spacing were not
   implemented in text mode.

Related, but older problems:

 * Environment `divstyle' as well as macros `\colorbox' and
   `\fcolorbox' were not implemented for text mode.
 * Macro `\textfbox' hid a mismatched `begin{}'-`end{}' pair.

verification.payload:
tree 87f6991803ed0b26c37f54bf5cbb322f020163b4
parent 1cd00a83fd066fec7eb8fbb6c8b86b9af20a7550
author Chris Spiel <cspiel@freenet.de> 1606121805 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1606121805 +0100

Synchronize the code paths for GNU Info and Plain Text output (#51)

with the recent changes in the HTML path.

 * Dest.put_unicode OutUnicode.visible_space raised an exception in
   text mode.  The new code expands macro `\textvisiblespace' on the
   fly and prints its expansion.
 * Margin paragraphs, hyphenation and fine-grained spacing were not
   implemented in text mode.

Related, but older problems:

 * Environment `divstyle' as well as macros `\colorbox' and
   `\fcolorbox' were not implemented for text mode.
 * Macro `\textfbox' hid a mismatched `begin{}'-`end{}' pair.

commit.message:
Remove `height` and `width` from class `horizontal-rule` (#48)

* Remove `height' and `width' from CSS class `horizontal-rule'
to get consistent behavior of `\@hr' even in the presence
of the HTML optimizer.

* Introduce new CSS class `hrule'
and use it in places where no `style' attribute appears.  Keep
`horizontal-rule' only for cases where `style' overrides.

verification.payload:
tree 8fd8299cd85b6ca13ff9fc892a1423bc5b7793ba
parent a37d617eb61118813e8765d9b0ee92a5856b6c61
author Chris Spiel <cspiel@freenet.de> 1604998938 +0100
committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1604998938 +0100

Remove `height` and `width` from class `horizontal-rule` (#48)

* Remove `height' and `width' from CSS class `horizontal-rule'
to get consistent behavior of `\@hr' even in the presence
of the HTML optimizer.

* Introduce new CSS class `hrule'
and use it in places where no `style' attribute appears.  Keep
`horizontal-rule' only for cases where `style' overrides.

commit.message: [doc] Correct manual to acknowledge that `\raisebox` is now implemented.

[doc] Add 'Boxes, boxes..' in the published examples.
Co-Authored: Chris Spiel <cspiel@users.sourceforge.net>

Implement \makebox and \framebox; re-implement \fbox. (#45)

* Implement \makebox and \framebox; re-implement \fbox.
Add \makebox[WIDTH][ALIGN]{TEXT} and \framebox[WIDTH][ALIGN]{TEXT}
with most of their LaTeX functionality.  Base new definition
of \fbox on \framebox.

Alignment type `s' is unimplemented.

* Convert box width to a valid CSS length.

* Implement macros `\parbox' and `\raisebox'.

committer GitHub <noreply@github.com> 1604306862 +0100

Implement \makebox and \framebox; re-implement \fbox. (#45)

* Implement \makebox and \framebox; re-implement \fbox.
Add \makebox[WIDTH][ALIGN]{TEXT} and \framebox[WIDTH][ALIGN]{TEXT}
with most of their LaTeX functionality.  Base new definition
of \fbox on \framebox.

Alignment type `s' is unimplemented.

* Convert box width to a valid CSS length.

* Implement macros `\parbox' and `\raisebox'.

commit.message: [doc] Typo.

Rename CSS classes `vbar' and `hbar'
to `vertical-rule' and `horizontal-rule' respectively.
Document class `horizontal-rule' in the context of `\@hr'.

Add missing length units to HtmlCommon.put_length.
Augment horizontal rules generated through
function HtmlCommon.horizontal_line with class "hbar".
